short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A secure, alternative text storage, bypassing the system clipboard for enhanced privacy and security

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension offers a secure, alternative text storage, bypassing the system clipboard for enhanced privacy and security.

When you need to copy and paste text between Chrome tabs without exposing it to the system clipboard, this extension is the solution.

The source code is available at https://github.com/yankeguo/SecPaste.

The extension's code is straightforward and does not collect or share any user data.
